agency_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT agency_code, agency_name FROM ref_agency where is_display = 'Y' ORDER BY agency_name

vendor_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT vendor_customer_code, legal_name FROM vendor ORDER BY vendor_customer_code

department_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT d.department_code, d.department_name, a.agency_code, a.agency_name FROM ref_department d LEFT OUTER JOIN ref_agency a  ON d.agency_id = a.agency_id ORDER BY d.department_name

mwbe_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT minority_type_id, minority_type_name FROM ref_minority_type ORDER BY minority_type_id

industry_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT industry_type_id, industry_type_name FROM ref_industry_type ORDER BY industry_type_id

budget_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT budget_code, attribute_name FROM ref_budget_code ORDER BY attribute_name

budget_expense_category_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT object_class_code, object_class_name FROM ref_object_class ORDER BY object_class_name

revenue_class_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT revenue_class_code, revenue_class_name FROM ref_revenue_class ORDER BY revenue_class_name

fund_class_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT fund_class_code, fund_class_name FROM ref_fund_class where fund_class_name = 'General Fund' ORDER BY fund_class_name

funding_source_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT funding_class_code, funding_class_name FROM ref_funding_class ORDER BY funding_class_name

revenue_category_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT revenue_category_code, revenue_category_name FROM ref_revenue_category ORDER BY revenue_category_name

revenue_source_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT revenue_source_code, revenue_source_name FROM ref_revenue_source ORDER BY revenue_source_name

payee_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT vendor_customer_code,legal_name FROM vendor ORDER BY legal_name

expense_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT document_id FROM history_master_agreement ORDER BY document_id

spending_expense_category_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT expenditure_object_code, expenditure_object_name FROM ref_expenditure_object ORDER BY expenditure_object_name

capital_project_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT reporting_code "Capital Project Code" FROM disbursement_line_item_details where coalesce(reporting_code,'') <> '' ORDER BY reporting_code

document_id_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT disbursement_number FROM disbursement_line_item_details ORDER BY disbursement_number

spending_category_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT spending_category_name, spending_category_code FROM ref_spending_category ORDER BY spending_category_name

contract_type_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT agreement_type_code, agreement_type_name FROM ref_agreement_type ORDER BY agreement_type_code

award_method_code_list.sql: SELECT DISTINCT award_method_code, award_method_name FROM ref_award_method ORDER BY award_method_code
